Event.Name: REGICIDE
Event.Title: How Does It Work
Event.DetailText: In addition to the regular scout units, each player begins with their hero. The goal of this game mode is to kill all the enemy heros. As soon as a player loses their hero, that player is instantly defeated.

Event.Name: FloodOnslaught2
Event.Title: Game Setup
Event.DetailText: You can set the Firefight Difficulty using the first AI Player in Team Bravo (The AI that gets destroyed in the beginning of the match). Waves scale depending on playercount.

Event.Name: FloodOnslaught
Event.Title: Difficulty Scale
Event.DetailText: Easy reduces damage and health to 0.3 percent Normal reduces damage and health to 0.75 percent Heroic reduces damage to 0.9 percent and adds 15% to unit bounties (faster veterancy leveling) Legendary increases damage and health by 30% and velocity (Unit Speed) by 20% percent and adds up to 100% to bounties (faster veterancy leveling)

Event.Name: FloodOnslaught5
Event.Title: Win Condition
Event.DetailText: Currently, the only method to win Flood Onslaught is to survive 100 waves. Feedback is valued. (This can take up to 2 hours per session)

Event.Name: FloodOnslaught Versus
Event.Title: Versus
Event.DetailText: This mode allows you to play a 3 players versus 3 players while constant flood waves attack.

Event.Name: FloodOnslaught3
Event.Title: Start
Event.DetailText: All players start with extra units/buildings. Those can be either light infantry with a tank, two supply buildings or one supply building with a anti-infantry turret.

Event.Name: FloodOnslaught4
Event.Title: FL Units
Event.DetailText: The Juggernaut is a large Flood command form, which is hard to destroy. The best method is to either delay it using light infantry or to push with several different units. Their main purpose is to keep atleast one player busy while everyone can build up for the main waves.

Event.Title: Credits

Event.Name: Credits1
Event.Title: Sketchfab
Event.DetailText: "Halo: Infinite - Skewer Banished" by Glitch5970 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution. "Pulse Carbine - Halo: Infinite" by Glitch5970 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.

Event.Name: Credits2
Event.Title: Halopedia
Event.DetailText: Unit descriptions may use text from Halopedia. Check out their awesome work.

Event.Name: Credits3
Event.Title: TheRealSlimLady
Event.DetailText: The Prowler, Spectre, Revenant, H3 Brutes, H3 Pureforms, H3 ODST and HW2 Abomination were made by TheRealSlimLady. She also created the Marauder and Banished Scarab as a commission(no pay) by TheRealSlimLady.

Event.Name: Credits4
Event.Title: ZAD_47
Event.DetailText: The Banished Brute Minor (textures are from me) was imported as a unpaid commission by ZAD_47.

Event.Name: Credits5
Event.Title: Tools
Event.DetailText: This Mod was created using PhxGui by KornnerStudios Foundry by Stumpy HWDE Universal Geometry blender plugin by Stumpy Modmanager by Medstar
